text:
February 4, 1957
Hr. Elmer Hutchisson, Dean
The Graduate School
Case Institute of Technology
University Circle
Cleveland 6, Ohio
Dear Dean Hutchisson*
Thank you very much for the copies of your preliminary reports on two-way
closed circuit TV* These will be incorporated in our Fact Sheets*
A set of these, with Index will be sent you as soon as the latter, being
Â£e$ised, is brought up-to-date*
Once again our sincere thanks.
Cordially,
Harry J. Skarnia
Executive Director
